title: NVIDIA backs decentralized cloud provider Aethir for future of AI and cloud gaming
description:
Singapore-based Decentralized Cloud Infrastructure (DCI) Aethir has announced its inclusion in the NVIDIA Inception program. The collaboration signifies the rise of decentralized technology as an option to create secure, fast, and cost-effective artificial intelligence (AI) and gaming experiences globally. Aethir’s central product, the Aethir Atmosphere, embodies a GPU-as-a-Service ecosystem, democratizing a novel web3 cloud for […]

The post NVIDIA backs decentralized cloud provider Aethir for future of AI and cloud gaming appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Resurgence of Bitcoin ‘whales’ signals confident market movement
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin has been witnessing an exceptional accumulation across all cohorts in Oct. 2023, a trend that has not been seen this year. CryptoSlate’s analysis on Oct. 19 unearthed that this accumulation reached its zenith in July, right before Bitcoin began its upward trajectory from $30,000. This data underscores the strong confidence and active […]

The post Resurgence of Bitcoin ‘whales’ signals confident market movement appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Floki and Dogelon Mars Show Huge 1 Week Gains, Is NuggetRush Next?
description: Floki and Dogelon Mars emerge as this week’s biggest winners. NuggetRush is set to become the future of memecoins. Analysts forecast a 3,000% rise in its price after launch. title: Shiba Inu Unveils Shib Name Service (SNS) – Redefining Shibdentity’s Future
description: Shibarium has launched the Shib Name Service (SNS) to transform complex digital addresses into easy-to-remember names. SNS is part of Shibdentity, a larger initiative to decentralize and secure digital identities. Shibarium recently announced the introduction of the Shib Name Service (SNS). This innovative service transforms complicated digital wallet addresses into more recognizable and user-friendly names. [...]

title: Here’s Why Polkadex Remains Polkadot’s Major DEX
description:
Crypto users love decentralized exchanges (DEXes) due to features such as staking, swapping, and yield farming. However, Polkadex offers all these and more, putting it in a class of its own. Polkadex is a fast, cheap, and secure P2P order-book decentralized exchange. It features its own parachain that enables users to bridge their tokens with […]

The post Here’s Why Polkadex Remains Polkadot’s Major DEX appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: DOP Provides More Decentralized Data Control
description:
The Web3 future will all be about control over your data. Many layer 2 solutions and layer 1 chains are catering to this. Most often, they use privacy in their marketing. That’s where DOP or the Data Ownership Protocol is different.  Their name already implies what they are offering. That’s right, DOP offers data ownership. […]

The post DOP Provides More Decentralized Data Control  appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Vitalik Buterin Transfers 100 ETH Worth $181K to Coinbase
description:
“Vitalik.eth”, the Ethereum wallet address belonging to Vitalik Buterin, Ethereum’s co-founder, was spotted transferring 100 ETH, worth $181,000, to the Coinbase crypto exchange. According to the renowned Chinese crypto reporter Colin Wu, the transaction happened in the early hours of today, November 1, 2023. While posting the information on X (formerly Twitter), Wu noted that […]

The post Vitalik Buterin Transfers 100 ETH Worth $181K to Coinbase appeared first on Coin Edition.
